bibl.title: Isis, or the Moon.
bibl.note: Isis' transformation into a lunar deity among Greeks and Romans.

bibl.title: Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part I

bibl.seg: DELIA Diana, Isis, or the Moon.

Willy CLARYSSE, Antoon SCHOORS and Harco WILLEMS (Edd.), Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 84 (Leuven, 1998) pp. 539-550.
Isis' transformation into a lunar deity among Greeks and Romans.
